import React from "react"; import { MotionMain, fadeIn } from "./animations/sharedAnimations"; // Adjust the path if necessary function Subscription() { return (

Subscription Plans

Choose a plan that fits your needs.

Basic Plan

Access to all our facilities from 9 AM to 5 PM on weekdays.

$50/month

Premium Plan

Access to all our facilities anytime. Includes free participation in group classes.

$100/month

 ); } export default Subscription;
